name: AbsoluteZero
description:
The planet is currently under nuclear winter and no one knows when and why it happened. Your mission is to eliminate nuclear winter and bring life back to it.

Your mission is to find a way to reverse this nuclear winter. 

Controls

W,A,S,D  -> movement
SpaceBar -> jump
Left-click -> shoot,
Right-click -> Shoot EMP charged ammo
F -> grapple hook on any object in range.
